title: Resolve a Field Query
description: A construction crew has encountered an unforeseen underground obstruction and needs guidance from engineering.

tasks.description: Log a field query (FQ) in the system, describing the problem and the exact location.
tasks.expected_outcome: The supervisor creates a new FQ with all the details.

tasks.description: The system automatically routes the FQ to the responsible civil engineer.
tasks.expected_outcome: The engineer receives a notification about the new field query.

tasks.description: The engineer reviews the query, develops a solution (e.g., 'reroute the pipeline around the obstruction'), and sends the response back to the field.
tasks.expected_outcome: The engineer provides a solution, which is logged in the system and sent back to the supervisor.
